name: One Leaf After Another
description:
You play as a kid who you parent just whent of to war and you are trying to cope with them being gone but you are a leaf about to hit the ground......... There are 3 different endings...........

- Controls

               -arrow keys to move 

-Please give me feed back and any bugs you find in the game!!!

- Try my other games,https://shadownat3.itch.io/what-is-my-purpose, https://shadownat3.itch.io/the-dumb-secret,https://shadownat3.itch.io/one-leaf-after-another

Im working on a remastered version right now with more color cutscenes and better grapics.
